name: The Baldling's Last Stand: ONLINE
description:
Made for MoonJam 2022


Made in 3 days for MoonJam 2022.


You are the last surviving Baldling. The sad counterpart to the Changeling. An online PVP game networked over twitch chat (not this version.) Play as multiple enemy types and discover the secret to growing hair. Twitch chat creatures can't damage each other. Use your deceptive transformations to out smart them and catch them off guard.


Made by:

Kuju

Smolboisad


Changes made post-gamejam because the game was way too hard for moonmoon:

Reduced the required soul deposits as the baldling.

Reduced the required soul deposits as the boss.

Baldling attack rate increased 100%.

Baldling hearts increased from 3 to 9.

You can press R to transform back into the baldling.

You spawn as baldling instead of slime.

Made music slightly louder.


If you're going to be the host, download moonbuild.exe

If you're a pleb, download plebbuild.exe


Runs on a dedicated server, so no peer to peer at all.
